decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | Prior to the practical completion of the proposed outbuilding, the existing outbuilding shall be demolished in full as shown on the approved plans within Condition 3.

Reason: To ensure compliance with the approved plans and to prevent the overdevelopment of the rear garden with ancillary structures, in accordance with Policy DAA of the Draft Ealing Local Plan, Policies LV7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD and Policy D4 of the London Plan.
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

4939/001 Rev A (Site Location Plan); 4939/002 Rev A (Existing Plot Plan (Part); 4939/003 Rev A (Existing Street View); 4939/004 Rev A (Existing Site Layout); 4939/005 Rev A (Existing Photos Sheet 1); 4939/006 Rev A (Existing Photos Sheet 2); 4939/007 Rev A (Existing Section AA); 4939/009 Rev F (Proposed Street View); 4939/010 Rev E (Proposed Site Layout + Roof Plan); 4939/011 Rev E (Garage Plan as Proposed); 4939/012 Rev E (Elevations as Proposed)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as garage, following the demolition of existing garage
